amendment.description: To reduce barriers for Hispanic-serving institutions in defense contracts, defense research programs, and other minority-related defense programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3346 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3346 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S6785-6789) To reduce barriers for Hispanic-serving institutions in defense contracts, defense research programs, and other minority-related defense programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3346 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3346 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
